reuters.title: U.S. SHOE INC 4TH QTR SHR 31 CTS VS 56 CTS
reuters.body: Owens-Corning Fiberglas Corp said it sold its controlling interest in its French foam insulation producing subsidiary to a Lafarege Corp <LAF> subsidiary. Owens-Corning said it sold its interest in Sentuc Porxpan SA for an undisclosed price. Reuter 
